text: Shirley MacLaine (born April 24, 1934) is an American movie and theatre actress. She is famous for her acting as well as her strong belief in reincarnation. She is the writer of a many autobiographical works, some about her New Age beliefs, as well as her Hollywood career. She is the older sister of Warren Beatty. She won the Academy Award for "Best Actress" in 1983, and has also received many other awards, including the Emmy, Golden Globe and BAFTA Awards. ==Other websites== * MacLaine's official website * * Shirley MacLaine interviewed by Ginny Dougary (2005) Category:American Academy Award winning actors Category:Actors from Richmond, Virginia Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:1934 births Category:Living people
title: Shirley MacLaine
